Articles.Content:
My 'go anywhere' Mining vessel.

So far it's only been to Minmus and Ike but with careful refuelling, shoulf be able to get into orbit almost anywhere.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/MIEXc)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/xb8avbdc255a690/Mine%204%20%20NMJ.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xb8avbdc255a690/Mine%204%20%20NMJ.craft?dl=0)

Not bad, although the intersecting solar panels make me itchy.

So is this a "Fellow314's Ships" thread or a "Show off Your Mining Ships" thread?

> 
> Not bad, although the intersecting solar panels make me itchy.

I know what you mean. I figure it's quantum.

> 
> So is this a "Fellow314's Ships" thread or a "Show off Your Mining Ships" thread?

Oh, everyone's, I think. I tried to find a thead but couldn't, so any 'infinite range' mining ships here. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I know what you mean. I figure it's quantum.
> Oh, everyone's, I think. I tried to find a thead but couldn't, so any 'infinite range' mining ships here. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119038-Showcase-Miners-miners-miners-everywhere-Post-your-pics-here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119038-Showcase-Miners-miners-miners-everywhere-Post-your-pics-here)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It is listed in the Showcase directory...
Well, I didn't say I looked very hard...
oic. Thanx. Sorry for precipitating a derailment of the thread ^^;
